trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs> class provides information about the invalid input character, namely its zero-based position in the formatted string and a general description about why the character was rejected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs>類別提供了無效的輸入字元，也就是以零為起始位置的格式化的字串和字元遭拒的原因的相關的一般描述的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> named `MaskedTextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>名為`MaskedTextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that contains the zero-based position of the character that failed the mask.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，其中包含遮罩失敗之字元的以零起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The position includes literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 位置包括常值 (Literal) 字元。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint" /> that generally describes why the character was rejected.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint" />，一般是描述字元被拒絕的原因。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor sets the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.Position%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.RejectionHint%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.Position%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.RejectionHint%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position in the mask corresponding to the invalid input character.
trans-unit.target: 取得與無效輸入字元相對應之遮罩中的位置。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that contains the zero-based position of the character that failed the mask.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，其中包含遮罩失敗之字元的以零起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The position includes literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 位置包括常值 (Literal) 字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.Position%2A> property is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.Position%2A>屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> named `MaskedTextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>名為`MaskedTextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerated value that describes why the input character was rejected.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述輸入字元被拒絕原因的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint" /> that generally describes why the character was rejected.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint" />，一般是描述字元被拒絕的原因。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs> property is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs>屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
